CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Company_name__c ) , "",Company_name__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Property_address_line_1__c) , "",Property_address_line_1__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Property_address_line_2__c) , "",Property_address_line_2__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Property_address_towncity__c) , "",Property_address_towncity__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Property_address_county__c) , "",Property_address_county__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Property_address_postcode__c) , "",Property_address_postcode__c &BR() )& " United Kingdom " &BR() & IF( ISBLANK(Customer_phone__c) , "", 'Phone: ' & Customer_phone__c )
CustomField.label: NEW Property address formula
